title: Meh tmux popup to display claude status across all running claude panes
description: Tmux popup (triggered by meh keybinding) that shows Claude status across all running Claude panes in all windows and sessions. Should allow selecting a Claude instance to switch to that session & window.

title: Raycast extension for tmux Claude communication
description: Create raycast/extensions directory for Raycast extensions. Build a new extension that can communicate with tmux Claude instances. Needs further exploration & feature thought.
